name: Airtight
description:
Airtight is about a rocket ship that needs to make it to the end of 10 stages. Each time a stage is completed, the stage will shrink and the stage will become harder. Complete the stage 3 times to move onto the next level. Made for the BenBonk Game Jam #2, with the theme of limited space. Use WASD or arrow keys to move.

Difficulty

There are two difficulty modes in the game, easy and hard mode. Difficulty changes how fast the ship moves. Airtight was meant to be played on hard mode, but I realized this may be quite hard to certain players. So I wanted to give players the option to play on a more forgiving mode that makes it just a bit easier to pull off those tough turns, and focus a bit more on the fuel puzzles. If you would like to switch difficulty mid game, press space, while the ship is still.

Art, code and music by BeansBoi72

Font - https://www.dafont.com/gamer-2.font
